channel.title: [DELTA] About teleblock in the wild . Please read and help :)
channel.description:
Hey :)
I make in my wild , a place with wall for funpking . It is in level 44 wildy and i added a portal in this place to teleport at home when pking is finish . But there is the problem of the Teleblock . The portal don't work because of the teleblock .
How can i make a portal in the wildy , without teleblocking ?
Please help , thank you :)

item.title: [DELTA] About teleblock in the wild . Please read and help :)
item.dc:creator: @briice14 briice14
item.description:
@briice14 wrote:

Oh that’s greaaaat !

Thank you so much, i didn’t think about that !

I would rep ++ if i could !

Thank you

Read full topic
item.source: [DELTA] About teleblock in the wild . Please read and help :)

item.title: [DELTA] About teleblock in the wild . Please read and help :)
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Make it so it doesn teleport you but that it moves you. To do that put this:

toX = COORD;
toY = COORD;

Read full topic
item.source: [DELTA] About teleblock in the wild . Please read and help :)
